# Heavy Equipment Rental Services for Water Infrastructure

## Title

* English: Heavy Equipment Rental Services – Water Infrastructure, Swift Current, SK
* French: Services de location d’équipement lourd – Infrastructure hydraulique, Swift Current (Saskatchewan)

## Reference and Solicitation Numbers

* Reference Number: cb-37-41042203
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-25-006
* Amendment Number: 1

## Contract Award Notice

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) intends to award a service contract to Rocky Rents for the rental of heavy construction equipment for the Water Infrastructure Division, located in Swift Current, SK.

## Contract Requirements

* The contractor will provide the rental of heavy construction equipment, including large track hoes, pay loaders, ride on packers, and mini hoes, as well as smaller equipment such as jumping jacks, cordless concrete hammer drills, water pumps, tampers, and trailers.
* The contractor must demonstrate the ability to rent the required equipment without interruption, ensuring that the equipment is available for use from the date of delivery to the completion of the project.

## Contract Period

* The contract is scheduled to commence on May 21, 2024, and end on March 31, 2025.

## Estimated Contract Value

* The estimated contract value is $110,000 (including GST) for the initial contract period and any optional periods.

## Contact Information

* Natalie O’Neill, Contracting Specialist, Western Service Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Email: natalie.oneill@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (306) 807-8740

## Submitting a Statement of Capabilities

* Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities in writing, either via letter or email, to the contact person identified above, by May 2, 2024, at 2:00 pm CST.
* The statement must demonstrate how the supplier meets the requirements outlined in the contract award notice.

## Notice of Intention to Award

* This notice is being issued in accordance with the Government Contracts Regulations and the Advance Contract Award Notice policy.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
